body.p:
Lexington August 29th 1863
To his Excelency
Govornor of Ky

on yesterday there was tryed in the Fayett Circuit Coart one B. F. Barns Charged with Steeling one mule from Mr Georg Brand and Convicted for four years the Jurys verdict Recomending to your Excelencys mercy the Jury Did not now Barns as Well as I Do he is one of fiv that Acted me two make there Escap and Conspierd to kill me to get Away him and one Mayloy Did make there Escape But I succeeded in Recapturing him By him Being taken again for getting money under false Pretenc I think he is a Bad man
you may hav seen the Dificulty I had With him and the others on the 17 of July I under stand he is going to Partition your Excelency I thought I Would Put you on your Gard

Your Humbel Servent
W. H. Lusby
Jailor of F, C,
